definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: The big plaster-walled living room held six framed photographs.
sentences.chinese: 客廳的板牆上掛着六個相框。

sentences.english: When you're satisfied with a final draft, handwrite it and put it in a picture frame.
sentences.chinese: 定稿後，用手寫一份放在相框裏。

sentences.english: It's an image that will be displayed below the drawings, like a frame for example.
sentences.chinese: 這是顯示在桌面小程式下方的圖形，就像是相框一樣。

sentences.english: Updated the photo frames throughout the house.
sentences.chinese: 給家裏各處的相框換了照片。

sentences.english: Please, no more mugs, frames, or stuffed animals.
sentences.chinese: 求求你了，別再送杯子，相框或者小動物填充玩具了。

sentences.english: The Tic Tac Toe photo frame is made up of a grid with 9 spaces.
sentences.chinese: 井字遊戲相框由一個分9格的大相框製成。

sentences.english: The Tic Tac Toe photo frame is made up of a grid with 9 spaces.
sentences.chinese: 井字遊戲相框由一個分9格的大相框製成。

sentences.english: This practical key ring is also a photo frame and mirror.
sentences.chinese: 這款實用的鑰匙扣也可作爲相框兼鏡子。

sentences.english: The shallow depth of field as well as the natural framing focuses the eyes on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 淺景深同樣能作爲自然的相框，讓眼睛關注拍攝主體。

sentences.english: The photographs will look nice framed in red.
sentences.chinese: 這些相片鑲以紅色相框會很好看。

sentences.english: You can buy framed photos of the new first family.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以買到相框裝幀好的奧巴馬一家的全家福。

sentences.english: Learn how to make a picture frame in this free video clip about gluing flowers to picture frames.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在此免費視頻剪輯膠花約一個相框相框。

sentences.english: Learn how to make a picture frame in this free video clip about gluing flowers to picture frames.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在此免費視頻剪輯膠花約一個相框相框。

sentences.english: Then he hammered together a photo frame for his daughter.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他給女兒釘了一個相框。

sentences.english: She kept a photograph of her mother in a silver frame.
sentences.chinese: 她將她母親的照片放在銀製相框裏。
